title: [Large-scale] Team-Based Learning Course in Pharmacotherapy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical knowledge and comprehension of clinical pharmacology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment emphasizing collaborative problem-solving through real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and solve real-world clinical scenarios by applying core pharmacotherapy concepts.
Learners enhance their ability to develop and critically evaluate medication treatment plans through team collaboration.
Formative assessments enable learners to diagnose and address individual learning gaps.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
